summary:
~A General’s Ambition~ 

So my last piece with General Grievous blew up, so I decided to draw him again, but with a full body...
caption:
~A General’s Ambition~

So my last piece with General Grievous blew up, so I decided to draw him again, but with a full body pose. I also wanted to do a pop out piece like my previous pic.

He’s on a search and kill mission XD

reblog.comment:
~A General’s Ambition~

So my last piece with General Grievous blew up, so I decided to draw him again, but with a full body pose. I also wanted to do a pop out piece like my previous pic.

He’s on a search and kill mission XD

blog.description: My names Loki ! They/Them ! 15 ! Genderfluid queer kid ! I am SHARP...perhaps just MAYBE soft-ish ! Hi its me ya dumb fuckin kinnie- ! Art tag is '#mods art' and selfie tag is '#mod face' ! Art blog is @smol-artist-loki ! Not a rp blog ! Get to know me in the '#me' tag ! original posts on '#it speaks' ! previously betterlokisuggestion and smol-gay-nerd-loki(2) ! HEADER BY @spidermansuggestions !

summary: You always wear a heart on your sleave. Its cracked and broken but good. It’s your heart and still working after all of this and...
body:
You always wear a heart on your sleave. Its cracked and broken but good. It’s your heart and still working after all of this and thats what matters.

But no matter how broken it is youre always willing to give away a peice of it for someone else.

reblog.comment:

blog.title: Retori
blog.description: Welcome! I'm always open to talk, but my responses might be a little lagged. Please be patient! I love making people happy and I love making things. Whether Its animations, 3d, writing and much much more. I also love concept art and video games (otaku for life). I'm pretty weird, but I'll always try to be nice. I don't bite!

blog.name: kolajmag
blog.title: Kolaj Magazine
blog.description: a quarterly, printed magazine about contemporary collage.

summary: COLLAGE ON VIEW Petit peur sur la ville Guillaume Chiron at Château de Bressuire in Bressuire, France, 18 January-10 February...
caption:
COLLAGE ON VIEW

Petit peur sur la ville

Guillaume Chiron at Château de Bressuire in Bressuire, France, 18 January-10 February 2019. Chiron combines reality with unreal, known with the unknown. First, he deconstructs multiple samples of images produced and made available by the cultural industry. Then, he rebuilds and projects a new world, selecting and bringing together some of these fragments. Sometimes, chance comes into play and magic happens. The cracks and the outlook are coming together. New scenes appear, funny or incongruous, strange and reflective. MORE

Kolaj #24 is now available. Our goal with every printed issue is that Kolaj Magazine is essential reading for anyone interested in the role of contemporary collage in art, culture, and society. Kolaj #24 is no different.

Are you getting Kolaj Magazine delivered to your door? Subscribe Today!
U.S. & International Subscribers go HERE | Canadian Subscribers go HERE
